english.segment1: I've been standin' here a while. Looking down these dusty roads. The long one seems like at least another mile. Or I could follow the crowd and hope it leads me home
english.segment2: But you've been here with me so far. To follow You means to journey on. And You've promised that the long road would be hard. But You've also promised I won't face it on my own
english.segment3: (Chorus). I will take the road less traveled. I will follow where You lead. For I know You've gone before me. To meet my need. And the road less traveled. Will make the difference in me
english.segment4: Choices come and then they go. And leave our hearts somewhere in between. Some may haunt us while others offer hope. Still we make decisions that determine who we'll be
english.segment6: (Bridge). I know I'm not alone. You always walk with me. And I'll go down any road. If I can hear You calling me, calling me
